mapper.select: SELECT suur.id as userId, suu.userName, sur.id as roleId, sur.roleName, sur.roleCode FROM sys_upms_user_role suur LEFT JOIN sys_upms_role sur ON sur.id = suur.roleId LEFT JOIN sys_upms_user suu ON suu.id = suur.userid WHERE userId = #{userId}
SELECT DISTINCT sur.roleName FROM sys_upms_user_role suur LEFT JOIN sys_upms_role sur ON sur.id = suur.roleId WHERE userId = #{userId}
